google.name: Google
google.description: Google's AI models from Google AI Studio.

models.name: Gemini 2.5 Pro
models.description: State-of-the-art thinking model, capable of reasoning over complex problems in code, math, and STEM, as well as analyzing large datasets, codebases, and documents using long context.

models.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash Thinking
models.description: Google's best model in terms of price-performance, offering well-rounded capabilities.

models.name: Gemini 2.0 Flash
models.description: Gemini 2.0 Flash delivers next-gen features and improved capabilities, including superior speed, native tool use, and a 1M token context window.

models.name: Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite
models.description: A Gemini 2.0 Flash model optimized for cost efficiency and low latency.

xai.name: xAI
xai.description: xAI's Grok models, as seen on X.

models.name: Grok 3
models.description: xAI's previous flagship model.

models.name: Grok 3 Mini
models.description: A lightweight model that thinks before responding. Excels at quantitative tasks that involve math and reasoning.

models.name: Grok 4
models.description: xAI's flagship model that excels at enterprise tasks like data extraction, programming, and text summarization.

openai.name: OpenAI
openai.description: OpenAI's AI models from OpenAI API.

models.name: GPT-4.1
models.description: OpenAI's latest flagship GPT model for complex tasks.

models.name: GPT-4.1 Mini
models.description: A smaller, cost-effective version of GPT-4.1, balanced for intelligence, speed, and cost

models.name: GPT-4.1 Nano
models.description: An ultra-efficient version of GPT-4.1, designed for low-cost applications.

models.name: GPT-4o
models.description: OpenAI's fast, intelligent, flexible GPT model

models.name: GPT-4o Mini
models.description: A smaller, cost-effective version of GPT-4o, designed for focused tasks

models.name: o3
models.description: OpenAI's most powerful reasoning model

models.name: o4 Mini
models.description: OpenAI's new faster, more affordable reasoning model

groq.name: Groq
groq.description: Fast AI inference for various open models.

models.name: DeepSeek-R1-Distill-Llama-70B
models.description: A distilled version of DeepSeek's R1 model, fine-tuned from the Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct base model.

models.name: Qwen QwQ 32B
models.description: Qwen/QwQ-32B is a breakthrough 32-billion parameter reasoning model delivering performance comparable to state-of-the-art (SOTA) models 20x larger on complex reasoning and coding tasks.

anthropic.name: Anthropic
anthropic.description: Anthropic's Claude models, known for their safety and reliability.

models.name: Claude 4 Opus
models.description: Anthropic's most capable model, boasting a high level of intelligence and capability.

models.name: Claude 4 Sonnet
models.description: Anthropic's latest model, with a good balance of performance and intelligence.

models.name: Claude 3.7 Sonnet
models.description: Anthropic's high-performance model, with early extended thinking

models.name: Claude 3.5 Haiku
models.description: Anthropic's fastest, low-cost model, providing intelligence at blazing speeds.
